If there is still no breathing and you have the resuscitation equipment, start ventilation.
5. Ventilation
Check the following before beginning ventilation:
/circle6  Select a mask of the appropriate size. It should cover the mouth, nose and tip of the 
chin, but not the eyes.
/circle6  Be sure there is a clear airway.
/circle6  Position the baby’s head.
